extendedInfo.description: Access and control DVR/Security cameras/IP Cameras. Watch live surveillance video streams - fast and simple.it can support most of the DVR made in china.it also support adnroid pda.- Compatible with all Android smartphones- Stream live video directly from your security devices- Support multiple DVRs- Supports control over PTZ cameras- Take snapshots of live streaming videoWe have a pro version support 4 view and have no ad.The URL ishttp://amzn.com/B00578189WSupport URLwww.meyetech.com

reviews.title: Worked when others didn`t
reviews.comment: This is very good. I tried 4 or 5 other apps and couldn`t connect. This was very easy to set up and fast connect to my security camera. Wished I had installed this first!
reviews.author: Don Harris

reviews.title: Excellent app but..
reviews.comment: Brilliant app for monitoring cctv anywhere! Only issue is that my pal with the same app on iPhone has more functions..like multi screen :(  Apart from that its great....
reviews.author: Amir Farid

reviews.title: Super Fast After Last Update
reviews.comment: This program works awesome . After the most recent update it loads each camera a lot faster. Thank you
reviews.author: Ryan Marcelle

reviews.title: Good n easy
reviews.comment: I hv tried so many software application cctv remote viewing for android but only Meye is working very well..thanks...
reviews.author: nidnuniaz gnawat

reviews.title: Great security App. But Snap Shots pics could be Better!
reviews.comment: Great app I\'ve been using it for one year now and I have no complaints except the snapshots could be more clearer.  Thank you for the great app. Always keep improving the images. Thank you.
reviews.author: Abe Saadi

reviews.title: The best of all
reviews.comment: I tried a couple of apps to monitor my office from anywhere. But after trying several other apps and a lot off trials by my cctv person, this is the only app which worked finally. So it deserves 5 stars. Recommend u also to install it without thinkin further..
reviews.author: Rakshit Parekh

reviews.title: 2 bright but works on my older e-secure dvr
reviews.comment: Was hesitent to get this because of the blinding bright blue. Glad i got it now the only one that works 4 me.wizh it wasn\'t so bright u can barely see the video past the blinding blue most  important it kills your data plan. And really poor quality

reviews.title: It works on Lorex Lh100 with Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: It works! Lorex website doesn\'t show LH100 is compatible wu th Android phone (it saids only window phone). I had to make sure I can connect via internet on my desktop first, fix all firewall and port forwarding and there it is! Depending on your camera, picture resolution varies. The scale is a bit distorted when view on phone as full screen. Other than that it works great! (As of 4/10 current release, LH100, Samsung Galaxy S3)
